title: Mixed Fruit Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: ['275g butter or margarine, softened', '180g dark brown soft sugar', '1 egg', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '200g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '245g porridge oats', '110g dried mixed fruit']
